item.title: Sword: IronFox
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Design-wise, try selecting all the points of the ‘sharp’ part of the sword (the blade, or lighter gray area) and moving them back towards the dark gray. The sword design is nice, and I think it would look even better as a slimmer long-sword.

Read full topic

item.title: Sword: IronFox
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

I really Love the design, please letme use it
I can put ur name in the item description.

Read full topic

item.title: Sword: IronFox
item.dc:creator: @The_Arcanian The Arcanian
item.description:
@The_Arcanian wrote:

luna-scape:

Gimme it

How much do you want it? :D[quote=“amy_webb, post:9, topic:479196”][quote author=The Arcanian link=topic=597427.msg4206764#msg4206764 date=1359045335]

You could have saves poly on the hilt by making the hand grip 4 sided as well as the part at the bottom of the handle, by joining some unnecessary lines together at the outer side of the blade you could also reduce poly.

Ahh, I see. Thanks for your opinion. The thing is, I don’t re-do any of the models. Maybe little fixes if neccesary, but i like to keep them the way they came up, so I can later on see how much i have improved.
[/quote]
I understand that, i like to look back at my older models too. I’m just suggesting it for future models, say next time you model a sword you might think of what i said and be able to do that instead.[/quote]
Ok. I will. Everyone should learn from their mistakes.

Read full topic

item.title: Sword: IronFox
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“The Arcanian, post:7, topic:479196”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=597427.msg4206708#msg4206708 date=1359036110]
You could have saves poly on the hilt by making the hand grip 4 sided as well as the part at the bottom of the handle, by joining some unnecessary lines together at the outer side of the blade you could also reduce poly.
[/quote]

Ahh, I see. Thanks for your opinion. The thing is, I don’t re-do any of the models. Maybe little fixes if neccesary, but i like to keep them the way they came up, so I can later on see how much i have improved. :)[/quote]
I understand that, i like to look back at my older models too. I’m just suggesting it for future models, say next time you model a sword you might think of what i said and be able to do that instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Sword: IronFox
item.dc:creator: @The_Arcanian The Arcanian
item.description:
@The_Arcanian wrote:

amy_webb:

Strange design, can you show a wire frame? I feel like it will look fairly messy, just from pictures and colouring, how did you make it? create or prim?

Started as primitive only. But I had to use the ‘create’ tool to connect the handle to the hilt after messing up a little.

[quote=“the elve age, post:3, topic:479196”]You know to post wireframes for real criticism :P. I like it, but why the rings?[/quote] I felt like it looks too cheap, so I added little more detail…

[center]

[/center]

Read full topic
